name: Spellcast
overview: An adventure game published in the Zzap! Megatape 18. It was something of a preview as it only contains a single level. The game was initially intended to be at least 3 levels with the initial forest level then a swap level and then the town area leading to a castle, inspired to some degree by Ghost n Goblins, but as they had not yet had their breakthrough hits, it got no big publishers interest despite the excellent, even great start so it was trimmed to a single finished level and published in the Megatape.
